body: @Reyas, sorry to burst your bubble but this Jun guy later becomes a cuck. If only the teacher fell for Kazuya even though he proposed to her......

Although there are much better NTR stories, this exact set is my favorite NTR story of all time and I dare say a contender for best NTR period. Jun starts off naive and trusting so he misses a lot of really obvious signs that she's blatantly cheating on him, but unlike most H-manga, Jun is an MC with character development. He rejects  Katsuko because he's no longer naive and can now see through her bullshit. Jun walking away from her is the perfect ending and the extensions the author made are all inferior to it.
MC has sense for once to leave the slut
Antagonist is the mc of ntr hentai cause he does what we want to see lol
yet another shitty story with good features, what a waste of talent by this author.
Amazing...but wanted Jun to get back at the bastard *sigh*

I wish they could add a happy ending for Jun like more years past and he had a happy family and then Jun sees Katsuko wandering the streets fucking whore and Katsuko approaches Jun then Jun just ignores her like a stranger,then boom her life really fucked up she has no one to approach.but atleast Jun had redeemed himself and chose to move on Rather than being played all over again, bravo MC.
Jun said she was still with kazuya and he was right. One last fuck and send her on her way now he can heal and move on with his life

well done for the mc, but it's sad, and she's totally a liar. I mean: at the end, she was not raped, but she asked for that (page 61), so: how can you just say ''it was all for protecting you'' and crying while you get refused by the guy you have betrayed so bad? Just fucking die, thot. It was totally a rape when she was ''forced'' to do that, but at the moment you asked for it... well... no. I'm happy she's totally empty and broken in the soul, totally depressed (you can see she have lost interest in life), but it's sad the mc get no revenge against the bastard. P.S. nice fap on this
